title: Repository Assignees
description: Detailed information about a repository assignee, including their repository, login, ID, node ID, avatar URL, gravatar ID, URL, HTML URL, followers URL, following URL, gists URL, starred URL, subscriptions URL, organizations URL, repositories URL, events URL, received events URL, type, site admin status, and permissions.

repository.description: The full name of the repository where the assignee is associated

login.description: The unique username of the assignee on the platform

id.description: The system-generated unique identifier for the assignee

node_id.description: The globally unique identifier for the assignee in the GitHub GraphQL API

avatar_url.description: The URL of the assignee's profile picture or avatar image

gravatar_id.description: The identifier for the assignee's Gravatar profile, if used

url.description: The API URL for fetching details about the assignee's account

html_url.description: The web URL of the assignee's public GitHub profile page

followers_url.description: The API URL for retrieving the list of users following the assignee

following_url.description: The API URL for retrieving the list of users the assignee is following

gists_url.description: The API URL for accessing the assignee's public gists

starred_url.description: The API URL for retrieving repositories starred by the assignee

subscriptions_url.description: The API URL for accessing repositories the assignee is watching

organizations_url.description: The API URL for retrieving organizations the assignee belongs to

repos_url.description: The API URL for accessing the assignee's public repositories

events_url.description: The API URL for retrieving events associated with the assignee

received_events_url.description: The API URL for accessing events received by the assignee

type.description: The category of the assignee's account (e.g., 'User', 'Organization')

site_admin.description: Indicates whether the assignee has administrative privileges on the site
